mainContent.main-text: Discover world of podcasts with us
mainContent.content-text: Experience a new way to enjoy podcasts with our innovative app. Browse, and share your favorite shows anytime, anywhere.

podcastInfo.f1heading: A Platform for Hosting Both Audio and Video Podcasts
podcastInfo.info-text-audio: Listen to your favourite podcasts and watch videos seamlessly on our platform
podcastInfo.info-text-video: Discover a new way to consume content with our platform's video capabilities.
podcastInfo.info-text1: Enjoy offline listening and curated playlists for a personalized experience
podcastInfo.info-text2: Listen at your preferred pace with adjustable playback speed
podcastInfo.info-text3: Explore a wide range of podcasts and videos to expand your horizons

discoverPage.heading1: Easily Search, Subscribe and Download Episodes
discoverPage.text1: Our podcast app allows you to effortlessly search for your  favorite shows, subscribe, and download episodes for offline listening
discoverPage.text2: Explore a vast library of podcasts and find new episodes to enjoy, all within our user-friendly app.
discoverPage.text3: Customize your podcast feed, create playlists, and receive personalized recommendations based on your interests.

contact.title: Let's work together
contact.text: Let's transform your ideas into reality! Take the first step towards collaboration by reaching out and sharing your vision. Your journey to success begins with a simple message. Together, we can make it happen!
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.textareaPlaceholder: Please tell us little bit more about your idea.
contact.heading: Stay tuned for inspiring podcast episodes.

unlockTreasure.title: Unlock Podcast Treasures
unlockTreasure.content: Delve into a vast audio landscape as we guide you through captivating stories

faq.faq_header_content: Your Questions, Our Answers: Explore our FAQ Section

newsletter.title: Get the Latest Updates Here
newsletter.header_content: Subscribe to our newsletter for updates, promotions, and exclusive content.
newsletter.footer_content: By subscribing you agree to with our
newsletter.footer_last: and provide consent to receive updates from our company.
